message.content:
cs.ET, cs.NE, cs.AR, cs.CE, cs.LG

The paper proposes and implements on-chip learning in analog hardware neural networks using conventional silicon MOSFETs as synapses. This topic falls under the intersection of several sub-fields in computer science, including electronic design automation (cs.ET), neural networks (cs.NE), computer architecture (cs.AR), computer engineering (cs.CE), and machine learning (cs.LG). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.ET and cs.NE, followed by cs.AR, cs.CE, and cs.LG.
